p: The influence of S. crispa crude polysaccharides on catalase (CAT) activity was assayed with the method developed by [ 32] with some modification. The assay mixture consisted of phosphate buffer (0.05 M, pH 7.0), the CPS sample (1 mg/mL, in water), the enzyme solution (60 U/mL), and H 2O 2 (0.019 M). The decomposition of H 2O 2 was determined directly by the extinction at Î» = 240 nm per unit time (3 min) was used as a measure of catalase activity.
